channel.title: Tuesday Talk with Robin M Powers
channel.description: Tips, Tricks and Mindshifts that will Rock Your Internet Business

image.title: Tuesday Talk with Robin M Powers

channel.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
channel.itunes:summary: Every Tuesday, the Internet marketing gurus Robin M Powers and Linda Allen will keep you up-to-date with new Internet Marketing Strategies you can use to build your business.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Every Tuesday, Robin and Linda will keep you up-to-date with new Internet Marketing Strategies you can use to build your

item.title: Must Have Fun!
item.description: When running a business it is critical that you keep your emotions on track so that your business maintains forward momentum. Here is the trick to doing that!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: When running a business it is critical that you keep your emotions on track so that your business maintains forward momentum. Here is the trick to doing that!

item.title: Do It Wrong Until You Get It Right
item.description: One of the largest failings we human beings have is a fear of making mistakes. In our businesses and in our personal lives fear will be so great that it will often keep us from starting over once we have failed. It will even sometimes prevent us from starting at all! Listen and this week as Robin gives you the key to overcoming this obstacle.
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: One of the largest failings we human beings have is a fear of making mistakes. In our businesses and in our personal lives fear will be so great that it will often keep us from starting over once we have failed. It will even sometimes prevent us from starting at all! Listen and this week as Robin gives you the key to overcoming this obstacle.

item.title: We Buy on Emotion
item.description: Understanding the psychology of your market can give you a huge boost in shaping the success of your business. This week Robin talks about a fundamental and critical aspect of how we all behave as customers - and gives you a big hint about what you need to do to to improve your communication with your potential customers.
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Understanding the psychology of your market can give you a huge boost in shaping the success of your business. This week Robin talks about a fundamental and critical aspect of how we all behave as customers - and gives you a big hint about what you need to do to to improve your communication with your potential customers.

item.title: The Seventh Power
item.description: This week Robin gives you a huge new secret weapon that not many business owners know. Make your success unavoidable with this powerful new tool!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: This week Robin gives you a huge new secret weapon that not many business owners know. Make your success unavoidable with this powerful new tool!

item.title: Mind Maps
item.description: This week Robin spills the beans on one of her favorite business and life tools: Mind mapping. Listen in as she tells you why you want to be doing this and how it can help your business.
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: This week Robin spills the beans on one of her favorite business and life tools: Mind mapping. Listen in as she tells you why you want to be doing this and how it can help your business.

item.title: Focus
item.description: Listen in this week as Robin talks about a critical business concept: Focus!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Listen in this week as Robin talks about a critical business concept: Focus!

item.title: Your Webmaster Gives You Exactly What You Ask For
item.description: A critical business concept is being able to lead your team effectively. This week Robin talks about increasing your education so that you can be leading your experts to get what you want - not what they think is best for you!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: A critical business concept is being able to lead your team effectively. This week Robin talks about increasing your education so that you can be leading your experts to get what you want - not what they think is best for you!

item.title: Memory Is A Poor System
item.description: This week Robin offers a challenge to go through your business and your life and eliminate those to-dos that you keep juggling in your mind, cluttering it with things that shouldn't be there. Placing those to-dos in a system that gets them done for you or at least reminds you of them in a timely manner will free up more mental cycles than you think!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: This week Robin offers a challenge to go through your business and your life and eliminate those to-dos that you keep juggling in your mind, cluttering it with things that shouldn't be there. Placing those to-dos in a system that gets them done for you or at least reminds you of them in a timely manner will free up more mental cycles than you think!

item.title: Your Own Personal ATM
item.description: This week Robin talks about the most powerful way to unhook your time from your money and leverage your income: The Internet. Want to know what the very first step is to making that happen?
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: This week Robin talks about the most powerful way to unhook your time from your money and leverage your income: The Internet. Want to know what the very first step is to making that happen?

item.title: Take My Advice - I'm Not Using It!
item.description: This week Robin talks about getting what you say you want and your action in alignment. Empower yourself to get what you want!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: This week Robin talks about getting what you say you want and your action in alignment. Empower yourself to get what you want!

item.title: Taking Commitment a Step Farther
item.description: Listen in as Robin teaches you how to take your commitments to yourself and your business to the next level. All of us have made commitments at one time or another, but how often have you made that commitment a daily process? This one will put you on the path!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Listen in as Robin teaches you how to take your commitments to yourself and your business to the next level. All of us have made commitments at one time or another, but how often have you made that commitment a daily process? This one will put you on the path!

item.title: An Interview with Barbara Marx Hubbard
item.description: A special treat this week! I had the good fortune to interview Barbara Marx Hubbard. As a futurist she paints a very interesting future for us all. Listen in as Robin talks with her about the Internet as planetary nervous system.
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: A special treat this week! I had the good fortune to interview Barbara Marx Hubbard. As a futurist she paints a very interesting future for us all. Listen in as Robin talks with her about the Internet as planetary nervous system.

item.title: Handling Interrupts
item.description: The third installment of powerful principles explored in the "4-Hour Workweek", Robin takes on handling interrupts this week. Enjoy!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: The third installment of powerful principles explored in the "4-Hour Workweek", Robin takes on handling interrupts this week. Enjoy!

item.title: Two Critical Tasks
item.description: Today Robin continues her series on Timothy Ferriss' fabulous book: The 4-Hour Workweek. This week is the concept of getting your two critical tasks done in an efficient fashion. But Robin adds her own powerful pieces to the strategy to make it even better!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Today Robin continues her series on Timothy Ferriss' fabulous book: The 4-Hour Workweek. This week is the concept of getting your two critical tasks done in an efficient fashion. But Robin adds her own powerful pieces to the strategy to make it even better!

item.title: Dreamlines
item.description: This week is the first in a series of valuable points Robin has learned from Timothy Ferriss' fabulous book: The 4-Hour Workweek. This week is the concept of Dreamlines which help you break down those dreams of yours into very achievable bite-size chunks. Enjoy!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: This week is the first in a series of valuable points Robin has learned from Timothy Ferriss' fabulous book: The 4-Hour Workweek. This week is the concept of Dreamlines which help you break down those dreams of yours into very achievable bite-size chunks. Enjoy!

item.title: Umbrella Drink Days
item.description: Every now and again you need to take time to recharge your batteries. Listen in as Robin gives you one of her favorite ways to rejuvenate after working hard on your business!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Every now and again you need to take time to recharge your batteries. Listen in as Robin gives you one of her favorite ways to rejuvenate after working hard on your business!

item.title: Notes on The Secret
item.description: As a followup to last week's radio interview Robin goes over what she sees as the most important messages in The Secret and how it affects you and your business.
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: As a followup to last week's radio interview Robin goes over what she sees as the most important messages in The Secret and how it affects you and your business.

item.title: Do you know the Secret?
item.description: Join Robin, along with her other panel mates, Jack Groverland, Minister of Unity of Boulder and Ira Churnas, professor of Religious Studies at the University of Colorado-Boulder while they discuss the movie and book titled "The Secret" in this one hour Radio Show aired on August 2, 2007.
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Join Robin, along with her other panel mates, Jack Groverland, Minister of Unity of Boulder and Ira Churnas, professor of Religious Studies at the University of Colorado-Boulder while they discuss the movie and book titled "The Secret" in this one hour Radio Show aired on August 2, 2007.

item.title: Lead Your Strategy
item.description: This week Robin talks about avoiding the trap of letting your team lead you. Formulating and keeping your vision is very important to keeping your business on track!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: This week Robin talks about avoiding the trap of letting your team lead you. Formulating and keeping your vision is very important to keeping your business on track!

item.title: Commitment
item.description: Do you know how to Fail Forward?
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Do you know how to Fail Forward?

item.title: Fastest Path to Cash
item.description: Listen in as Robin gives you her two most treasured strategies for discovering your own personal quickest and most powerful route to generating cash in your life!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Listen in as Robin gives you her two most treasured strategies for discovering your own personal quickest and most powerful route to generating cash in your life!

item.title: Stand on Your Own Two Feet
item.description: Tired of having to beg for time off? Stand on your own two feet!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Tired of having to beg for time off? Stand on your own two feet!

item.title: Don't Sell off Parts of Yourself
item.description: Listen in as Robin talks about dealing with an important issue regarding maintaining your self image and focus.
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Listen in as Robin talks about dealing with an important issue regarding maintaining your self image and focus.

item.title: The Power of Customer Service
item.description: Never underestimate the power of excellent customer service! We have all had those times when we have been treated with poor customer service and we remember how it left us feeling about that particular business thereafter. In this episode, Robin talks about some excellent customer service we have received from our vendors recently and how powerful an effect that has on our satisfaction as customers.
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
item.itunes:summary: Never underestimate the power of excellent customer service! We have all had those times when we have been treated with poor customer service and we remember how it left us feeling about that particular business thereafter. In this episode, Robin talks about some excellent customer service we have received from our vendors recently and how powerful an effect that has on our satisfaction as customers.

item.title: Quit Disqualifying Yourself
item.description: Trying new things in business and in life can be a challenge that stops us short of achieving our dreams. In today's episode Robin talks about dealing with this show stopper such that you can overcome the hurdle it presents and achieve all that you are capable of!
item.itunes:author: Robin M Powers
